name: ZenMaster
0:
”Alexa, ask ZenMaster for a koan”
”Alexa, ask ZenMaster to give me a koan”
”Alexa, tell ZenMaster to begin zen practice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen master
des: Ready to find your zen? Listen to a koan and practice meditating upon this question or paradox. Just say "Alexa, ask ZenMaster for a koan" or more simply "Alexa, begin ZenMaster".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
